game.title: The Wandering Hero
game.synopsis: A young hero embarks on a perilous journey to save their kingdom from an ancient evil.
game.beginning: In the peaceful kingdom of Astoria, a prophecy is revealed that foretells the awakening of an ancient evil. The king calls upon a young hero to undertake a dangerous quest to prevent the prophecy from coming true.
game.ending: After a long and arduous journey, the hero finally reaches the dark fortress where the ancient evil awaits. In a desperate battle, the hero manages to defeat the evil and save the kingdom. The hero returns to Astoria as a celebrated champion, hailed by all as the savior of the realm.
